# Łążyn, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Łążyn  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lubawa, within Iława County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  south-east of Fijewo (the gmina seat),  south-east of Iława, and  south-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
